---
title: "Measures"
description: |
  Performance Measures of the mlr3 ecosystem.
preview: images/logo_color.png
site: distill::distill_website
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(mlr3website)
library(htmltools)
library(mlr3misc)
library(data.table)
requireNamespace("mlr3verse")

content = as.data.table(mlr3::mlr_measures)
content$packages = link_pkgs(content$packages, remove = c("mlr3", "mlr3measures"))

# add line breaks to cells
sdcols = c("task_properties")
content[, (sdcols) := map(.SD, function(col) map_chr(col, function(x) paste0(x, collapse = "\n"))), .SDcols = sdcols]

setkeyv(content, "task_type")
setcolorder(content, c("label", "key", "task_type", "packages", "predict_type", "task_properties"))

setnames(content,
    c("label", "key", "task_type", "packages", "predict_type", "task_properties"),
    c("Name", "Key", "Task Type",  "Packages", "Predict Type", "Task Properties")
)
```


```{r, layout="l-page"}
datatable(
  content,
  style = "bootstrap",
  escape = FALSE,
  options = list(paging = FALSE, scrollY = "60vh", scrollX = TRUE, info = FALSE),
  rownames= FALSE)
```
